dashboard.title: Microsoft Azure Load Balancer Frontend Application

data.nrql: SELECT latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Updated' FROM microsoft_azure_loadbalancer_frontend_application FACET microsoft_azure_loadbalancer_frontend_application_name

presentation.title: Load Balancing Rule Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Load Balancing Rule of this Frontend Application

data.nrql: SELECT average(virtual_ip_availability) FROM microsoft_azure_loadbalancer_frontend_application COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Virtual IP Availability
presentation.notes: Availability of VIP endpoints, based on probe results

data.nrql: SELECT average(total_data_throughput) FROM microsoft_azure_loadbalancer_frontend_application COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Total Data Throughput (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Total throughput transmitted within time period

data.nrql: SELECT sum(total_packets_routed) FROM microsoft_azure_loadbalancer_frontend_application COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Total Packets Routed (Packets)
presentation.notes: Total number of Packets transmitted within time period

data.nrql: SELECT average(data_throughput_in) FROM microsoft_azure_loadbalancer_frontend_application COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Data Throughput In (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Total incoming throughput transmitted within time period

data.nrql: SELECT average(data_throughput_out) FROM microsoft_azure_loadbalancer_frontend_application COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Data Throughput Out (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Total outgoing throughput transmitted within time period

data.nrql: SELECT sum(packets_routed_in) FROM microsoft_azure_loadbalancer_frontend_application COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Packets Routed In (Packets)
presentation.notes: Total incoming Packets transmitted within time period

data.nrql: SELECT sum(packets_routed_out) FROM microsoft_azure_loadbalancer_frontend_application COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Packets Routed Out (Packets)
presentation.notes: Total outgoing Packets transmitted within time period
